document.docAuthor: Kohn, Anna & Fernandes, Berenice M. M.
document.masterDocTitle: Redescription of Rhipidocotyle jeffersoni (Kohn, 1970) Overstreet & Curran, 2002 (Digenea: Bucephalidae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Redescription of Rhipidocotyle jeffersoni (Kohn, 1970) Overstreet & Curran, 2002 (Digenea: Bucephalidae)

mods:name.mods:affiliation: Laboratório de Helmintos Parasitos de Peixes, Instituto Oswaldo Cruz, Fiocruz, Rio de Janeiro, RJ, 21045 -
Laboratório de Helmintos Parasitos de Peixes, Instituto Oswaldo Cruz, Fiocruz, Rio de Janeiro, RJ, 21045 -

subSubSection.paragraph:
Localities : Paraná River (locality: Guaira), 24°04’48”S , 54°15’21”W
and its reservoir (hydroelectric power station of Itaipu — localities: Guaira and Santa Helena), Paraná State , Brazil , 24°51’37”S , 54°19’58”W
.

Prevalence: 31% (eight of 26 fish examined); from 1991 to 1993
R. jeffersoni
was was not found in fish examined.

Deposition of specimens: CHIOC , n o 30.523 a–e ( holotype ); 33.610 a–e, 33.928 a–l, 36.608 a–d and 36.609 a–b (vouchers)
.

caption.paragraph:
FIGURES 1–5 .
Rhipidocotyle jeffersoni
whole worms from
Salminus brasiliensis
; 1. Holotype from the Mogi­Guassu River collected in 1970. 2–5. Represents additional specimens collected from the Paraná River, Guaira in 1985 (Specimens shown in figures 2,4 & 5 were collected from a single host specimen and the specimen shown in figure 3 came from a second host specimen). Scale bars 0.2mm.

TABLE 1. Measurements of
Rhipidocotyle jeffersoni
from
Salminus brasiliensis .
Measurements are given in micrometres unless otherwise stated, with means in parentheses.

subSubSection.paragraph: *Reservoir of the Hydroelectric Power Station of Itaipu. Description
